author: Rinn
name: acquireBuff
shortDesc: Get a buff from a buffbot
longDesc: This script will attempt to get you a buff from a buffbot without needing to know the price or even the bot's name.

author: rlbond86
name: Auto Mushroom
shortDesc: Automatically farms mushrooms from Degrassi Knoll
longDesc: Automatically farms mushrooms to produce 8 gloomy black mushrooms every 16 days, along with a lot of additional second and third generation mushrooms.

author: zekaonar
name: Best PvP Gear
shortDesc: Optimizes and balances gear for PvP mini-games
longDesc:
This script will help you optimize your gear for the PvP mini-games: Laconic Dresser, Verbosity Demonstration, Showing Initiative, The Egg Hunt, Meat Lover, Broad Resistance Contest, Lightest Load and Letter of the Moment. The script will check which mini-games are active and will retrieve the letter of the moment on each run.

There are options to buy cheap mall gear (default is 1k or less) superior to what you possess and provide a comprehensive list of the best gear in-game with wiki links to research how you may acquire it.

author: soolar
name: CONSUME
shortDesc: Automates your diet
longDesc: Eats, drinks, and spleens to maximize adventures using most cost-effective items given specified Meat per Adventure.

author: Ezandora
name: Detective Solver
shortDesc: Automates the 11th Precinct mysteries
longDesc: Detective Solver will complete all three daily egg murders for the 11th Precinct/Detective School Application IOTM, earning cop dollars.

author: guyy
name: DreadDrunk
shortDesc: Gives booze to the Dreadsylvania Carriageman
longDesc: This will find the most cost-efficient booze (given a non-insane number of mall searches) for making the Carriageman drunk as a Dreadsylvanian skunk, buy as much as it needs, and dump it down his throat.

author: Theraze, dj_d
name: EatDrink
shortDesc: Optimize your daily diet
longDesc: EatDrink.ash will attempt to fill you up with the finest vittles, firewater, and spleenables that the kingdom has to offer - and that you can afford. It considers things like prices, the relative value of adventures and stats, whether you have to pull or purchase the item, and so on. It even ends your day with a bang by overdrinking (if you tell it to).

author: gausie
name: Excavator
shortDesc: Collect spading data and send to Spading Central
longDesc: Set this as your spadingScript to collect and transmit data for use in current spading projects.

author: Ezandora
name: Far Future
shortDesc: Plays the Timespinner's Far Future mini-game once
longDesc: The FarFuture command will play the game to collect the prize of your choice and earn two medals.

author: Theraze & kitsunenine
name: Get Skill
shortDesc: CLI accessible skill acquisition
longDesc: Allows you to learn a skill directly from the CLI.

author: Ezandora
name: KGBriefcase
shortDesc: Automates the Kremlin's Greatest Briefcase
longDesc: The 'briefcase' command will unlock and configure your briefcase as desired.

author: fronobulax
name: Manage Store
shortDesc: Autosell or kBay items in your store that don't sell
longDesc: ManageStore looks at all the items in your store. It then offers the opportunity to autosell or sell on kBay all the items that are priced at the mall minimum, have a low (see below) sales volume or a ColdFront average price that is greater than the mall minimum.

author: coandco
name: NewYou
shortDesc: Sharpen Your Saw & Become a New You
longDesc: This will (usually) identify the New You quest activity and then perfom it until completion.

author: Bale
name: OBE Universal Recovery
shortDesc: Automated Recovery
longDesc: This is Bale's original repository.  It is recommended that this be uninstalled and the 'other' version be installed.

author: Bale
name: OCD Inventory Control
shortDesc: Complete inventory control system
longDesc:
This script will allow you to choose the proper dispensation for absolutely every item that may be in your inventory. You can tell it exactly how many to keep of any given item, or tell it to keep all of them. It can put items in the mall, send items as gifts, mix keys into pies, use gift certificates, stock your display case or autosell trash items. And more!

Okay, this script is honestly a little bit insane. It's somewhat nuts to list a method of dealing with every single item I may own. I use this because I want to cleanse my inventory before every hardcore ascension. It takes a bit of effort to make the list of everything, but now my inventory can be malled in a flash. If anyone else wants to take the trouble of making their own list it would do the same for them.

author: PazSox, bumcheekcity, hippoking & Th3y
name: Rollover Management
shortDesc: Maximize rollover turns and completes Daily Deeds
longDesc: Maximizes player for maximum turns with gear on hand.  Checks ALL daily deeds, Does all daily deeds that don't require user input.  Checks your Source Terminal for usage, and informs you if you're missing any upgrades.  Runs SNOJO Adventures if any are available, Runs 5 (free) adventures in the mines (if Unattended Minor skill is found), Checks Spacegate to see if any turns are remaining (or if it was even opened).  Grabs Cop dollars (if available), and Time Spinner items (if available)  Works in STANDARD, HARDCORE, and NON-STANDARD ascensions, and in AFTERCORE TOO!  Script will only spend a minimal amount of meat, just to buy a 'bag of park garbage', if none are in inventory, and charter is available.  And MUCH MUCH more!  It's easily customizable too!

author: fluxxdog
name: Superdrinks for Fun and Profit
shortDesc: Automates making Superdrinks if you have still access
longDesc:
This script is for whipping up Superhuman drinks. This is intended to be run as part of a beforeBattleScript. If you have your own, or use BestBetweenBattle, you can basically add this:

import "superdrinks.ash";
if(stills_available()>0) make_superdrinks();

author: Ezandora
name: Sweet Synthesis
shortDesc: Simplifies casting the Sweet Synthesis skill
longDesc: Cast Sweet Synthesis, specifying desired buff by keyword, buying candy from mall (in aftercore) or using from inventory (in-run) with confirmation.

author: Winterbay
name: Sushi
shortDesc: Eats best sushi for profit
longDesc: This script tries to look over your sushi-eating options and make the best choices based on a given meat-per-adventure. It can be used directly or imported into another script as described in the associated thread.

author: guyy
name: Tale Prank
shortDesc: Generates zany prank text
longDesc: Makes randomized remixes of Crimbo Tale, Monster Manuel, and other in-game sources. Sends the ridiculous results to unsuspecting players in time-spinner pranks or brick messages.

author: Bale, zarqon, community
name: Universal Recovery
shortDesc: Automated Recovery
longDesc:
This is the supported version of Bale's original. This script will change kolMafia's default healing functions to make the most of your available items in hardcore/ronin or make the most of your meat if you have access to the mall. That makes this a great restoration improvement for both ascenders and farmers.

To make this work automatically, you need to copy/paste the following line into the CLI:
set recoveryScript = Universal_recovery.ash

author: Veracity
name: Garden Harvester
shortDesc: Harvest any kind of garden
longDesc: This script lets you configure what you want from all possible gardens and will detect garden type and pick the right thing.

author: Winterbay, Rinn
name: autoBasement
shortDesc: Automates Fernswarthy's Basement
longDesc:
Automates Fernswarthy's Basement:
  • Creates and switches oufits
  • Uses cheapest buffs needed for necessary buffing
  • User perference to use Dr. Lucifer or other food/drink/spleen items.
See thread for full list of options.

author: Veracity
name: Arrrbor Day
shortDesc: Automate Arrrbor Day
longDesc: Visit the Arrrboretum, collect last Arrrbor Day's prize and adventure to set up the prize of your choice to collect next Arrrbor Day.

author: Theraze, izchak, Raorn, zarqon
name: Bounty
shortDesc: Automatic Bounty Hunter Hunter
longDesc: The purpose of this script is to automatically go to the Bounty Hunter Hunter, accept bounties, hunt them and turn in the completed bounties for lucre.

author: Loathing Associates Scripting Society
name: autoscend
shortDesc: Automated Ascension
longDesc: The collaborative continuation of sl_ascend/cc_ascend

author: Loathing Associates Scripting Society
name: combo
shortDesc: Comb Beach prioritizing rare tiles
longDesc: Use your beach comb to visit sections of the Beach that are known to contain rare tiles.

author: bumcheekcity, Winterbay
name: Bumcheekcend
shortDesc: Automatically script an entire ascension
longDesc:
This is a semi-automated hardcore ascension script. Its stated intent is to:
  1. Ascend Moxie characters through HCNP ascensions to get karma
  2. Ascend Muscle and Myst characters mostly, so you can finish off ascensions started with them
This is not intended for softcore, Bad Moon or any challenge path. If it works... fine, but bugs with will probably remain bugs.

author: bumcheekcity
name: BumPork
shortDesc: Automatically play Porko
longDesc: Simply complete the quest and unlock the Elvish Paradise, run bumpork.ash and it should work fine.

author: ungawa
name: CartoucheHunter
shortDesc: Seaches for Ed's Cartouches throughout the Kingdom
longDesc:
This script will adventure in every zone where you have not yet adventured today and aborts if you find a cartouche. It checks your session log for information about where you have adventured, so it knows if you already found one today and if you abort prematurely, it will pick up where it left off.

Before running the script, the player needs to:

  • Equip the Crown of Ed and pirate fledges
  • Maximize +combat%

author: Bale
name: CounterChecker
shortDesc: Manage automation for KoLmafia counters
longDesc:
This script will automatically handle all your counters automatically. Supported Counters:
  • Fortune Cookie: If you're not in hardcore it will get the available semi-rare with highest mall price.
  • Spookyraven Lights Out: If spookyraven counters are enabled this will automatically advance both quests.
  • Wormwood: Will automatically get the wormwood goal of your choice. (see instructions in thread)
  • Dance Card: Will adventure in Ballroom, if you're not already there and use another dance card.

To make this work automatically, you need to copy/paste the following line into the CLI:
set counterScript = CounterChecker.ash

author: Eliteofdelete
name: EoD Softcore Ascension Script
shortDesc: Does 100% automatic softcore ascension runs
longDesc:
This script automatically does softcore ascension runs with moxie classes. Features include:
  1. Ascends Moxie characters in 4-5 days.
  2. Requires no skills permed.
  3. Handles all pulls using ~100k meat.
  4. Very customizable if desired.
  5. Reports how many adventures were spent doing quest related things and saves the info.
More classes may be officially supported in the future.

author: Ezandora
name: FantasyRealm
shortDesc: Plays through the FantasyRealm area
longDesc: Automates the FantasyRealm to unlock bosses and collect rewards.

author: Ioeth, Banana Lord
name: Harvest
shortDesc: A highly customizable KoL farming script
longDesc: Can be configured to the farm whatever you like best. It runs from login to logout, handling all your daily activities (eg: buffbot buffs, prismatic wads, equipping optimal rollover gear etc.). It even hunts bounties.

author: Winterbay, dj_d
name: Make Meat Fast
shortDesc: Automates item farming based on current mall values
longDesc: It surveys the entire kingdom and all of your possessions to figure out what will make you the most meat. If something gets in demand - like briefcases did during one Crimbo - it automatically figures it out and farms accordingly. If farming the castle is best; great - it optimizes you for that as well.

author: slyz
name: Nemesis.ash
shortDesc: Automates the nemesis quest
longDesc:
1. Automatically do the LEW and nemesis Cave quests
  2. Farm until you get the volcano map
  3. Unlock the volcano island
  4. Unlock the nemesis lair and try to solve the volcano maze
Surviving combats is your responsibility.

author: wrldwzrd89
name: PandamoniumQuest
shortDesc: Automates the Steel Organ quest in Pandamonium
longDesc: This will find the various items needed to complete the quest in Pandamonium, solve the puzzles (perhaps changing your gear to maximize success), and finish by using the steel organ item if possible.

author: Ezandora
name: PirateRealm
shortDesc: Farms fun points in PirateRealm
longDesc: Automates the PirateRealm to collect FunFunds. Can handle any island..

author: guyy
name: Pork to the Future
shortDesc: Automates the agua de vida quests
longDesc:
A script to automatically complete:
  1. Primordial Fear: Be Cyrus's punching bag
  2. Hyboria: Krakrox does manly things (includes Hunt the Wumpus)
  3. Future: Collect elemental essences
...and get you a nifty Secret from the Future.

author: soolar, cheesecookie
name: SL_Ascend
shortDesc: Automated ascenscion
longDesc: soolar's fork of cheesecookie's cc_ascend

author: Alhifar
name: Slime Tube
shortDesc: Automates the Slime Tube
longDesc:
This script will adventure in the slime tube, changing outfits to get the most turns of Coated in Slime possible, and wiping off the slime whenever you are no longer able to survive the damage you would receive combined from Coated in Slime, and the combat.

It will take advantage of Navel runaways and Bandersnatch runaways, and supports the following skills for damage calculations: Attack with weapon, Thrust-Smack, Lunging Thrust-Smack, Saucegeyser, Weapon of the Pastalord, Shieldbutt, Fearful Fetuccini and divines, both single and funkslung.

author: guyy
name: Space Tripper
shortDesc: Automates the Space Trip minigame
longDesc: Beats Space Trip for you, aiming for a high score for maximum tickets... and more importantly, unlocks the Space Trip Safety Headphones (-100 ML and -combat accessory). Get a token, run the script, and it will play the entire game on its own, opening the relay browser to the final screen when it's finished. May lose or get stuck occasionally due to RNG screw.

author: Ezandora
name: Spacegate
shortDesc: Automates your daily Spacegate turns to collect research
longDesc: Spends 20 turns a day at a 'Z' difficuly planet with all rocks.

author: Theraze
name: The Sea
shortDesc: Automates all underwater quests
longDesc:
Read the thread for information on how to configure this script to do any of the following:
  • Adventure to unlock all 5 monkees
  • Adventure to get you to the hatred boss outfit
  • Adventure to get you to the violence boss outfit
  • Chat with Grandpa about all known chat topics
  • Get Das Boot or other reward from the Old Man
  • Unlock and complete the Skate quest
  • Get a sushi mat and install it
  • Get an aerated diving helmet

author: guyy
name: TrickTreat
shortDesc: Automates Halloween Trick or Treating
longDesc:
Automates Halloween Trick or Treating.
  • Optional Configuration: Choose separate outfits named "trick" for combats and "treat" for non-combats. If you don't do this, then it will use your current equipment for all encounters.
  • If you encounter All-Hallow's Steve, it will abort so you can fight him yourself.
  • Check the mall prices for candies you acquire with your current equippable outfits if you type the following command in the CLI: tricktreat outfits

author: PazSox
name: Unlock Dreasylvania
shortDesc: Unlocks Dread, Banishes Monsters, Offers help
longDesc: Unlocks Dreadsylvania zones one at a time, or multiple at once, Banishes Monsters, Offers help on how to setup bosses, and explains roughly how kisses work.

author: Veracity
name: BeachComber
shortDesc: Automate Combing the Beach with your Beach Comb
longDesc: Configurable script to visit random sections of the Beach to comb your desired patches of sand with your Beach Comb.

author: Veracity
name: Gingerbread City
shortDesc: Automate the Gingerbread City
longDesc: Highly configurable script to allow automation of turns in the Gingerbread City, specifying the morning, afternoon, and night adventuring locations and the noon and midnight non-combats.

author: Veracity
name: VeracityMeatFarm
shortDesc: Farm Meat and perform daily tasks
longDesc: Farm Meat and do daily tasks as enabled by numerous IoTMS.

author: Veracity
name: ShadowRift
shortDesc: Automate Rufus quests in the Shadow Rift
longDesc: Accept artifact, entity, or artifact quests from Rufus, adventure through the Shadow Rift to fulfill them, and collect fancy rewards.

author: Veracity
name: VeracitySpacegate
shortDesc: Automate Spacegate
longDesc: Highly configurable script to choose or visit a Spacegate planet of your desired difficulty with your desired encounters.

author: PazSox
name: Zap Wand
shortDesc: Automates Dungeons of Doom to get ZAP Wand
longDesc: Automates Dungeons of Doom to get ZAP Wand

author: zarqon
name: BatMan RE
shortDesc: Provides advanced combat interface in browser
longDesc: Provides advanced combat HUD and automation in the relay browser. It will display recommended actions to complete combat and solve quests. You can them execute them as a macro by clicking.

author: digitrev
name: extraction
shortDesc: Automates use of the DNA Lab
longDesc:
This is a two-part script for using the DNA syringe. The first part is a custom combat script that will automatically extract the DNA you want. The second part is an afteradventure script, to automate creation of gene tonics or hybridization.

See the forum post for details on setup.

author: zarqon
name: SmartStasis
shortDesc: Automates stasis and other non-lethal combat
longDesc:
Automates stasis and everything else that doesn't kill a monster such as insulting pirates and flyering.

To make this work, you need to put consult SmartStasis.ash into your CCS followed by a method of killing the monsters.

author: Winterbay
name: WHAM
shortDesc: All-knowing CCS
longDesc:
This is a custom combat script. First it makes use of every trick known by SmartStasis and then...
It kills all the things.

To make this work, you need to put the following lines into your CCS:
[ default ]
consult WHAM.ash

author: Eliteofdelete
name: Ascension Checklist Handler
shortDesc: Helps with daily pulls
longDesc: This stores all your ascension relevant items into an easy to view relay script, based on on a variety of factors such as path, class and astral items. It helps you build a pull lists based on the factors that matter to you. It will even alert you to type69 status if your path is current. Finally, it will help you to buy and pull items in run based on your decisions.

author: Theraze, zarqon
name: CanAdv
shortDesc: Check if you "Can Adventure" at a location
longDesc:
Check whether you can adventure at any given location.

This is most useful when imported into other scripts and may be automatically installed by them.

author: fronobulax
name: CFStat
shortDesc: Acquire price and sales volume from Coldfront
longDesc: Fetches and caches price and sales volume from Coldfront

author: froubulax
name: Currencies
shortDesc: Assists in spending currencies for items to be sold
longDesc: A relay script that builds a table of things that can be obtained from a currency and sold for meat.  Table includes ColdFront sales volume and meat per currency to assist in determing which exchanges are to be made.

author: fronobulax
name: DCQuest
shortDesc: Assists completionists in managing their display case
longDesc: DCQuest is an information gathering script for the Display Case completest. It looks at every displayable item that your version of Kolmafia knows about and writes tab delimited files with some annotation in the data subdirectory.

author: Ezandora
name: Guide
shortDesc: Complete Ascension Guide
longDesc: Guide is a relay script that will give advice on playing KoL. It details how to complete quests you're on and what resources you have available. During an ascension, it will inform you what you need to know to complete your ascension as quickly as possible including faxing, the daily dungeon, acquiring a wand and where to go next.

author: Turing, Veracity
name: Missing Manuel
shortDesc: Missing Manuel factoids!
longDesc: This scans Monster Manuel to get a list of monsters with missing factoids.

author: zarqon
name: Prefref Plus
shortDesc: Manager for all your ZLib settings and mafia prefs
longDesc: Your one-stop settings and preferences manager.  Conveniently search, configure, delete, revert to default, and understand your ZLib script settings and KoLmafia properties.

author: zarqon
name: Psychose-a-Matic
shortDesc: One-stop psychoanalytic jar management
longDesc:
The psychoanalytic jars dropped by the Angry Jung Man add a lot of fun content to KoL. Each jar is a flavorful mini-quest with a sweet sword for a reward. It can be tedious, however, to manage everything -- the jars are in your inventory, the NPCs are all over the kingdom, the couch is in your campground, and all the quest information you might want to seek out is on the Wiki.

When I was setting out to experience all the jar content for myself, I immediately realized a script which organized this information and put it all in one place would be a big click-reducing asset to completing the jars. Hence, this script.

author: rlbond86
name: Relay Task List
shortDesc: The ultimate "To Do" list!
longDesc:
This relay override shows a task list at the bottom of main.php displaying stuff you still need to do. Unlike some other scripts that might be similar, this one is programmable using ASH.

If you don't know anything about ASH programming, that's OK! The task list comes preprogrammed with all of the in-run main quests as well as some side quests and The Sea. It's quite functional even if you never touch the programmable aspect.

author: Lxndr, Almighty Sapling
name: Skill Planner/CS Tracker
shortDesc: Relay script detailing the characters skills and CS
longDesc: This is an informational script very similar to the profile snapshot, but with some critical differences. All the information is stored locally, rather than online. The layout is a little different, and semi-customizable to your liking. It shows familiars, trophies, tattoos and skills. The skills come with a nice little queue so that you can drag and drop them into place and sort them based on priority.

author: guyy
name: Slimecalc
shortDesc: The slime calculator, for efficient Slimetubing
longDesc:
This is a tool for finding the best (i.e. cheapest) way to boost Slimetube ML for a specific turncount.

The CLI command slimecalc [number of turns] will display a shopping list of items to produce that turncount. Use slimecalc run [turns] to have the script buy and use those items for you.

Additional functionality is explained in the forum thread.

author: Aventuristo
name: Snapshot Maker
shortDesc: Take a snapshot of your character to display
longDesc:
Makes a snapshot of your character and display it on a website where everyone can see it.

This updates Cheescookie's and Bumcheekcity's Sanapshot Makers, which are no longer supported.

author: cheesecookie, bumcheekcity
name: Snapshot Maker
shortDesc: Take a snapshot of your character to display
longDesc:
Makes a snapshot of your character and display it on a website (where everyone can see it) with lots of boxes that you compulsively want to make green.

Yes, completionist torture...

author: PazSox
name: Standard Rollover Bonus
shortDesc: Informs you about gear you have for rollover
longDesc:
This script checks all items you have which will give you bonus adventures for rollover. It checks on-hand and storage items for gear, familiar, chateau, & campground items.

It tells you how many of each item you have and the adventure bonus you will receive for it.

It will tell you how many pulls you have available. This is made primarily for softcore players. It works in both standard, and unrestricted ascensions.

author: rlbond86
name: Superhuman Cocktail Maximizer
shortDesc: Calculates which drinks to superhumanly cocktailcraft
longDesc:
Have Superhuman Cocktailcrafting and a bunch of ingredients? Don't know how to make as many drinks as possible out of all your stuff? Not sure what to use your still charges for?

Enter this Cocktailcrafting Maximizer. The script will run a linear program to determine how to maximize your still uses and what drinks to create. It will try to first maximize the total number of drinks you can make, breaking ties by total profit.

The script won't actually do anything when you run it. You'll have to create the drinks yourself.

author: lostcalpolydude
name: Tower Checker
shortDesc: Naughty Sorceress' Tower checklist
longDesc: This script gives information about what you have and still need for climbing the tower. It gives the same information as the telescope command, plus it lets you know if you need a drum, guitar, star items, keys or an item for the final boss. This is mostly so you don't forget to farm/pull an item before reaching the tower.

author: UberFerret
name: UberPvPOptimizer
shortDesc: Optimizes equipment for PvP
longDesc:
This script will equip your character with equipment to maximize the value of current PVP minigames. It will use the best equipment in inventory or buy better gear if you enable that setting.

Updated through at least season 19.

author: zarqon
name: BatBrain
shortDesc: A central nervous system for consult scripts
longDesc:
A central nervous system for consult scripts.

This library script will not work by itself and may be automatically installed by other scripts.

author: Ezandora
name: Choice Override
shortDesc: Allow multiple choice.ID.ash relay scripts.
longDesc:
Allow multiple choice.ID.ash relay scripts.

This library script will not work by itself and may be automatically installed by other scripts.

author: zarqon
name: CLI Links
shortDesc: Adds CLI commands to relay scripts
longDesc:
Adds CLI commands to relay scripts.

This library script will not work by itself and may be automatically installed by other scripts.

author: jasonharper
name: Form of...HTML!
shortDesc: Code library to add input forms for relay scripts
longDesc:
Code library to add input forms for relay scripts.

This library script will not work by itself and may be automatically installed by other scripts.

author: Ezandora
name: Gain
shortDesc: Allows fast querying of which effects have which numeric_modifier()s.

author: zarqon
name: Mercenary Mood
shortDesc: Manages other gazoodles of between battle stuff
longDesc: Manages other gazoodles of between battle stuff via a mood.  Plays nicely with BestBetweenBattle

author: Veracity
name: vcon
shortDesc: Veracity's consumable library
longDesc:
Functions to find the most profitable food, booze, and spleen items based on adventure yield and expected MPA.

This library script will not work by itself and may be automatically installed by other scripts.

author: Ezandora
name: VotingBooth
shortDesc: Votes

author: Veracity
name: vprops
shortDesc: Veracity's property management library
longDesc:
Functions to easily manage custom properties and convert back and forth between simple data types (and sets and lists of such) and a string representation which is suitable to store in such properties.

This library script will not work by itself and may be automatically installed by other scripts.

author: zarqon
name: ZLib
shortDesc: Zarqon's general function library for scripting
longDesc:
Zarqon's general function library for scripting.

This library script will not work by itself and may be automatically installed by other scripts.

author: zarqon
name: BestBetweenBattle
shortDesc: Manages gazoodles of between battle stuff
longDesc:
Manages gazoodles of between battle stuff. That includes choice adventure default options, turtle taming, switching item drop familiars and much more.

To make this work automatically, you need to copy/paste the following line into the CLI:
set betweenBattleScript=BestBetweenBattle.ash

author: guyy
name: LootBot
shortDesc: Sell dungeon loot, lazily
longDesc: This is an experimental thing intended to make selling untradeable dungeon loot only marginally more complicated than Mall-selling.

author: Bale
name: New Life
shortDesc: Scripting the birth of a new ascension
longDesc:
Scripting the birth of a new ascension. This sets optimal choice adventure defaults for your class and ascension path. It also does a few repetitive housekeeping chores such as visiting the Toot Oriole, opening your pork sack, using your Newbie Tent, equipping your starting gear...

To make this work automatically, you need to copy/paste the following line into the CLI:
set postAscensionScript = newLife.ash

author: beldur
name: 8bit-relay
shortDesc: Enhances The 8-bit Realm Colors with colors and b onus info.
longDesc: Colors each area in The 8-bit Realm with the color whereby they give double points and adds an information panel detailing your expected bonus

author: darkcodelagsniper
name: Airport Colors
shortDesc: Colors each plane in the Elemental Aiport with the appropriate elemental color
longDesc: Colors each plane in the Elemental Aiport with the appropriate elemental color

author: Ezandora
name: Asdon Martin GUI
shortDesc: Enhances view of Asdon Martin in your workshed
longDesc: Choose desired effects and choose fuel more efficiently.

author: Bale
name: Bale's Campground
shortDesc: Additional functionality for your campground
longDesc:
Adds several nice features to your campground:
  • Telescope: When you "Look Low" it adds detail, telling you exactly what items you need to kill the tower monsters and where to find them.
  • Bookshelf: Tells you how many tome and libram summons you have done today.
  • Workshed: Allows easy switching of workshed appliances if you haven't done so today.

author: Bale
name: Bale's Mall
shortDesc: Extra links added to your mall entrance
longDesc: If you click on the "mall" link in the top menu it modifies that page. Not everyone uses the page, but for those who do... This adds several links as shortcuts to managing your item prices and viewing recent store activity.

author: Bale
name: Bale's Museum
shortDesc: Museum Leaderboard skin
longDesc: Want to see which commendations for the current path are silver and which are bronze? This playful override adds numerical rankings and colorizes the player's names so that you can tell at a glance who just missed getting a silver star.

author: Bale
name: Bale's Topmenu
shortDesc: Topmenu skinned for increased functionality
longDesc:
• Adds a clan whitelist drop-down. Click on the name of any clan in your whitelist to go there!
  • Adds an image of the Florist Friar's Cottage. Seeing the image helps me remember to use him.
  • Adds an image of a Hobo Fort to link directly to the clan raid logs.
  • The moons link to the Noblesse Oblige calendar.
  • It adds a few helpful links like "bean" for over the beanstalk and "manor" for Spookyraven Manor.
  • It tries to be intelligent about only adding links as they become relevant.
  • Does a few of these things for drop-down style menus also

author: Ezandora
name: Bastille
shortDesc: Enhances view of Bastille Battalion control rig to let you select rewards
longDesc: Choose desired rewards via relay browser or CLI.

author: rlbond86
name: Bounty Hunter Helper
shortDesc: Shows turncount for available bounties
longDesc: Tired of opening the KoL Wiki every day to check on which bounty is the fastest? Ever realized that the turns quoted on the Wiki are inaccurate? This relay script was made to display bounty information in a helpful, easy way.

author: guyy
name: buttonFrenzy
shortDesc: Improves buttons for all stores
longDesc: A buttontastic improvement to the interface of mall-stores and (most) NPC stores.

author: Heeheehee, Theraze, Rinn
name: Charsheet: Skills by Class
shortDesc: Groups skills by class on the charsheet
longDesc: On your charsheet it will sort your skills by character class.

author: Bale, Chez
name: ChIT
shortDesc: Character Pane Replacement
longDesc: This skins your left pane to make everything easier to see at the same time. It also adds a lot of great tools such as an outfit switcher, MCD control and Florist plant visibility and control. It is so shiny and awesome that your entire life will be better and you'll wonder how you ever lived without it... at least that is what everyone tells me.

author: ckb
name: ckb's Iconic topmenu
shortDesc: Alternate topmenu relay overide, with fun icons!
longDesc:
Changes KoL's link style top menu into something similar to KoL's iconic top menu, but an original creation.

Icons are smaller than KoLs menu, and so this is more compact, and it does not have the large description popup (alt text only), and I added some color highlighting to more easily find what you want. The basic structure is utility on line 1, locations on line 2.

author: Bale, bordemstirs
name: Clan Raidlog Parser
shortDesc: Parse your clan dungeon Raidlogs
longDesc: Parses the clan dungeon Raidlog to make your clan dungeons like Hobopolis and Dreadsylvania a lot more friendly. It is the KoLmafia version of Dr.Evi1's famous greasemonkey script.

author: Bale
name: Dinsey Landfill
shortDesc: Tracks your progress towards gaining each of the four keycards and killing Wart Dinsey
longDesc: Tracks your progress towards gaining each of the four keycards and killing Wart Dinsey

author: rlbond86, ckb
name: Enhanced Inventory Spoilers
shortDesc: Shows item effects/enchantments in inventory
longDesc: This will display information about every item in your inventory, below its name.

author: rlbond86
name: Fax Identification
shortDesc: Tells you what you got from the fax machine
longDesc: I kept getting annoyed when I wouldn't get the fax I wanted. So I wrote this relay script which displays what just arrived in the fax machine.

author: Ezandora
name: Genie
shortDesc: Relay script for the genie bottle to more easily choose wishes.
longDesc: Choose monsters to fight, effects, stats, ponies, etc.

author: Ezandora
name: Helix Fossil
shortDesc: Adds 'script' and 'again' buttons to Pocket Familiar battles
longDesc: Automate battles and use axiliary script to choose your team.

author: rlbond86
name: Improved Guild Trainer
shortDesc: Shows skill descriptions for all these newfangled skills
longDesc: Displays the description for every skill at the Guild Trainer.

author: Bale
name: LT&T Office
shortDesc: Display full quest information for the LT&T Office
longDesc: Do you have all the LT&T quest information memorized? With that information it can be hard to make an informed decision about which quest to select. When you go to the LT&T office in the relay browser, this will display full information concerning all possible quests. It will list the monsters you have to fight, the boss at the end, and any incidental prize of note along the way. In case you have trouble defeating the final boss, you can click the boss's name to see its entry on the KoL Wiki.

author: Bale
name: Manor Informer
shortDesc: Get full status on Manor unlocking from ground floor
longDesc: Display full status of Manor unlocking when viewing the ground floor.

author: rlbond86
name: Modular Choice Override
shortDesc: Allows overriding of choice adventures
longDesc:
This relay script is really more of a framework.

Ever wanted to override a choice adventure, but been frustrated with mafia's lack of support? It's very difficult to override a single choice adventure and not interfere with other choice adventure overrides. This script is designed to make overriding choice adventures easy and conflict-free.

author: Bale
name: Monster Manuel: Improved
shortDesc: Lets big monsters be big in KoL's Monster Manuel
longDesc:
Lets big monsters be big in KoL's Monster Manuel.

This also adds annotations for ambiguous monsters such as which Nightstand is which, the toolbearing Gremlins, the version of the El Vibrato monsters that you get from the translator and quite a few others.

author: Smelltastic
name: Noobsorb
shortDesc: A relay script to keep track of Gelatinous Noob absorptions.
longDesc: For each modifier, provides a dropdown list of skills that affect it with available items

author: Bale
name: NS Tower Scroller
shortDesc: Automatically scrolls the Sorceress' Tower
longDesc: You know how the new NS Tower is this ridiculously long page that you have to keep scrolling down to reach the bottom? Install this script to scroll that for you.

author: Lacey Jones
name: Pizza Cube GUI
shortDesc: Helps you choose ingredients to bake a desirable pizza
longDesc: Choose pizza ingredients to maximize adventures, give desirable effects, and/or have special features.

author: Bale
name: Snojo Training
shortDesc: Provides information about Snojo training modes
longDesc: Provides information about Snojo training modes. This including number of turns trained today, number of turns trained in each mode and how many turns until each possible prize.

author: Ezandora
name: Source Terminal GUI
shortDesc: Enhances view of Source Terminal in your campground
longDesc: Choose desired skills, enhancements, extrusions, and enquiries.

author: Veracity
name: Spacegate Sounds
shortDesc: Plays KAWOOSH when you activate the Spacegate
longDesc: If relayAddsSounds is true, when you activate the Spacegate, you'll get a Stargate KAWOOSH.

author: Bale
name: Spelunky Reference
shortDesc: Adds helpful Spelunkin' non-combat information
longDesc: The most confusing thing about playing the Spelunkin' minigame is keeping track of the non-combats. This adds helpful information about all the Spelunkin' non-combat information to the Spelunky map as well as information about which non-combat to expect next.

author: guyy
name: TrophyTastic
shortDesc: The trophy case de-suckifier
longDesc:
Trophies! They're great. But arranging them is a pain in the (chaos) butt(erfly).

This script transforms the barely usable trophy case into a means of creating bitchin' trophy configurations quickly instead of over many hours while you slowly lose your mind.

author: Bale
name: Wiki Links
shortDesc: Pop-ups descriptions link to entry on KoL Wiki
longDesc: This alters KoL's pop-up windows, making the title of the window into a link to its entry on the KoL Wiki. This improves the pop-up descriptions for effect, familiar, item, outfit, skill and Pasta Thrall.

author: Bale
name: Woods quest starter
shortDesc: Get transfunctioner and screwdriver automatically
longDesc: Automatically get the continuum transfunctioner and screwdriver when woods are first visited. This saves some repetitive clicking at the beginning of your ascension.

author: ckb
name: WTF Familiars
shortDesc: Display familiar information from terrarium
longDesc:
I have a lot of familiars. And the list is growing. And I can't keep track of what they all do. WTF? How am I supposed to remember exactly how 100+ vaguely named creatures perform? I cannot. I know the hipster does lots of stuff and gives free fights... and so does the goth kid. But the goth kid is really a fairy right? No, its a volleyball. Or a leprechaun... I don't remember.

I could look this up on the wiki over and over. And I used to. Then I wrote this relay script to tell me.

author: ckb
name: WTF Inventory
shortDesc: Display information about items in your inventory
longDesc:
Updates your inventory page with WTF-style descriptions for items and effects. This is a modified version of rlbond86's Enhanced Inventory Spoilers, which is a modified version on my original Inventory SPOILERZ relay override script. It will display information about the items in your inventory below their name.

This script uses the same basic WTF code as the others, so you get standardized colors and fonts and look and feel.

author: ckb
name: WTF Shops
shortDesc: Help with the Dungeon Vending Machine
longDesc:
For the Daily Dungeon Vending Machine, this will show you which keys you have and which keys you do not have. It will take away the link to buy keys you already have. It will also check if you have a key lime pie in your inventory, and show that you DO have the key IF you have the pie.

This is because I am forgetful and will pull a pie AND buy the key at the same time, and that sucks.

author: ckb
name: WTF Skills
shortDesc: Skill list is sorted, clickable and informative
longDesc:
When casting skills and buffs from the relay browser, they are color coded to help distinguish types. Active effects from skills are highlighted.

The incentive here is that I found myself going to the skills page to buff up and forgetting what each skill does and which skills I had already cast and which ones were single effect only (songs and expressions). This should make that more clear and more easy.

author: ckb
name: WTF VIP Lounge
shortDesc: Help with the VIP Concession Stands
longDesc:
Hot dogs and Speakeasy Drinks from the VIP lounge are totally sweet -- awesome food, great in HC, and they give some totally sweet effects, but I can't remember what any of them do. To find out, first you have to click the item to open up an info box, which has a link to the effect, which you then click to give its description.

Or you can skip that process by using this script so you won't have to click anything.

author: Irrat
name: AccountVal
shortDesc: Script to value the worth of your account
longDesc: This JS script lets you find the worth of your account, you can have it only show items that are still tradeable, or everything including the iotms you've already bound to your account. This is a rewrite of soolar's accountval.ash script and is heavily inspired by their work.
